"use client" import { useState } from "react" const InventoryManagement = () => { // Sample data - replace with real data from your API const [orderStats] = useState({ totalPO: 45, finishedPO: 32, pendingPO: 13, totalClientOrders: 28, finishedClientOrders: 20, pendingClientOrders: 8, }) const [materialData] = useState([ { material: "Cement", quantity: 500, pendingQuantity: 50, unit: "bags" }, { material: "Steel Rods", quantity: 2000, pendingQuantity: 200, unit: "kg" }, { material: "Bricks", quantity: 10000, pendingQuantity: 0, unit: "pieces" }, { material: "Sand", quantity: 150, pendingQuantity: 25, unit: "cubic meters" }, { material: "Gravel", quantity: 200, pendingQuantity: 30, unit: "cubic meters" }, { material: "Paint", quantity: 80, pendingQuantity: 10, unit: "liters" }, { material: "Tiles", quantity: 500, pendingQuantity: 0, unit: "sq meters" }, { material: "Wood", quantity: 100, pendingQuantity: 15, unit: "cubic meters" }, ]) // Simple bar chart data for visualization const chartData = [ { name: "Total PO", value: orderStats.totalPO, color: "#3b82f6" }, { name: "Finished PO", value: orderStats.finishedPO, color: "#10b981" }, { name: "Pending PO", value: orderStats.pendingPO, color: "#f59e0b" }, { name: "Total Client Orders", value: orderStats.totalClientOrders, color: "#8b5cf6" }, { name: "Finished Client Orders", value: orderStats.finishedClientOrders, color: "#06b6d4" }, { name: "Pending Client Orders", value: orderStats.pendingClientOrders, color: "#ef4444" }, ] const maxValue = Math.max(...chartData.map((item) => item.value)) return (
